name: sonar-project.properties
content:
sonar.projectKey=mega_parser_perf
sonar.projectName=Mega Parser Performance Tests
sonar.projectVersion=1.0

# Path is relative to the sonar-project.properties file
sonar.sources=.

# Language-specific configurations
sonar.typescript.file.suffixes=.ts
sonar.kotlin.file.suffixes=.kt

# Encoding of the source code
sonar.sourceEncoding=UTF-8

# Analysis settings
sonar.verbose=true
sonar.log.level=DEBUG

# Exclude patterns
sonar.exclusions=**/node_modules/**,**/dist/**,**/build/**,**/*.test.*

# Host URL (if not default)
sonar.host.url=http://localhost:9000
